help.username: name of user running PACMan tools
help.output_dir: directory where output is stored, and where inputs are retrieved from
help.results_dir: directory where model results are stored
help.log_level: Set the level of logs printed to screen; options include 'info', 'debug', 'warning', 'critical'
help.close_collaborator_time_frame: Number of years over which to check close collaborators
help.train: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.categorize_one_cycle: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.get_science_categories: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.compare_results_real: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.duplication_checker: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.categorize_ads_reviewers: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.determine_close_collaborators: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.write_conflicts: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.make_assignments: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.cross_validate: if set to 'true', run_pacman will run this script; if 'false', step will be skipped
help.test_training: 'false' is default; if set to 'true', includes tests on training
help.duplication_checker_need_new_texts: 'true' or 'false', describing whether or not new scraped texts are needed
help.duplication_checker_newcycles: if 'true', generates hashes with new cycles
help.load_model: if 'true', load stored corpora in cross_validate
help.load_file: if 'true', load stored corpora in cross_validate
help.cross_val_score_bal: if 'true, determine cross validation score report from balanced dataframe
help.cross_val_score_raw: if 'true, determine cross validation score from total data set
help.conf_matrix: if 'true, produce cross validation confusion matrix
help.main_test_cycle: Prefix used throughout script to match with cycle description, eg. in format 'YYYYMMDD'
help.past_cycles: list of cycle prefixes of past cycles, eg ['20190204', '20160822']
help.scraper_cycles_to_analyze: default list of cycle prefixes of cycles to be used in proposal scraper, should usually be 'None'
help.training_filepath: file path for unclassified proposals for use in training
help.proposal_working_directories: location of working directories to retrieve science categories, eg. 'proposal_data/'
help.modelfile: name of model file to use
help.duplication_checker_corpus_suffix: suffix for pickle files of duplication hashes, likely '_hashes.pkl'
help.assignment_rankings_file_suffix: PKL file suffix describing rankings, eg '_panelists_match_check.pkl'
help.assignment_outfile_suffix: txt file suffix for output, eg '_assignments.txt'
help.compare_results_by_hand_file: text file suffix for classification results file categorized by hand, eg '_hand_classifications.txt'
help.comparison_outfile: suffix of text file that is output by comparing PACMan results and the by-hand categorization
help.training_suffix: filepath of text file(s) containing trainig corpora
help.train_savefile: pkl file name to which corpora is saved
help.cross_validate_savefile: pkl file name to which corpora from cross_validate is saved
